about_the_game:
Thank you for calling. This is Shangri-La, a live music club.

Welcome to the exhilarating staff action x live music cafe management simulation!

[Giggy Shangri-La] is a game in which you conquer a dungeon with a guitar in your hand and experience being a bartender at a live music club visited only by monsters.

The curtain opens on another exciting gig today, with colors that come to life and music that soars!

The main character, Yu Furuiido, wakes up to find that his favorite toys have attacked her!

  • Watch out for their attacks and play your guitar to close the gap between you and your enemies.

  • Jump left and right on the floor to find your own route of attack.

When you get right in front of the enemy, you have a chance for a direct attack!

  • When an enemy collapses, swing the guitar to inflict damage.

  • The damage increases according to the number of consecutive hits!

The defeated enemies will drop ingredients for drinks to be served to the live music club's guests!

  • If you don't make it back alive, you won't be able to take the items home. Be sure to win and go home.

    Coughing ventilators, tired refrigerators, and glasses shaking on the table. This is Shangri-La, a live music club.

    Offering musicians for the customers who come here in search of exciting time.

    • Offer an artist to take the stage tonight from among four different music genres.

    • The clientele changes depending on the artist you offer. Call out to them according to your mood tonight.

    Guess the audience's tastes and offer them a fancy drink!

    • Make the best drink with the items you brought back from the gig.

    • Try to give exceptional service to the customers  by judging their taste of drinks and how they feel about music club.

    Sometimes you'll get a customer who is a little difficult.

    • When a special customer comes in, have a conversation and find out what they like.

    • Use the recipe and the items you have on hand to mix the best drink. Don't forget to use the hints!!

    • if your strategy is successful, you will level up in the game faster.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R9 270x, 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
